sales.title: Armani, Prada, Miu Miu, Missoni, & More Sample Sale
sales.saleDescription:
One Of The Best Kept Secrets In NYC.

European Classic is opening its doors to their Garment District showroom. Are you a real fashionista? Do you just need an investment piece? Don’t miss their Italian Women ready-to-wear samples from Armani, Prada, Miu Miu, Missoni, and more from 60%-80% off the retail prices. Plus, luxury scarfs (cashmere/silk, reversible in 25 different colors), shoals & capes.

For Men: Emilio Visconti Made in Italy clothing including: Tuxedos, Suits, Cashmere Coats, Blazers, Pants, Shirts, Raincoats, Ties and more. Also brand names assorted samples from Ermenegildo Zegna, Balenciaga, Armani, Versace, Brunello Cuccinelli, Alexander McQueen and more (sweaters, coats, pants, shirts) and accessories (luxury scarfs, belts, wallets).

All new merchandise includes samples from the 2014 collections in stock.

By Appointment only. Call 917-821-7751 to set up an appointment.
sales.address: European Classic  48 West 37th Street  between 5th & 6th Avenues  11th Floor  , New York, NY

sales.title: Malia Mills Annual Sample Sale
sales.saleDescription:
Up to 75% off Malia Mills signature bra-sized swimwear separates, tankinis, one-pieces and cover-ups.

And — did you know Malia Mills is so much more than swimwear? Also take up to 75% off the Malia Mills super chic collection of ready-to-wear.

Details Details:

Swimwear: Malia Mills bra-sized swimwear tops, tankinis and maillots fit and flatter cup sizes 30A to 38E. Bottoms and maillots in sizes 2 – 16.

For example:

  • Malia Mills custom Chi-tah print D cup Danceteria top originally $265; now $119.25
  • Malia Mills high waist Calendar Girl brief in blue skies originally $200; now $90
  • Malia Mills ruched retro Dionne maillot in brown sugar originally $345; now $86.25 — gimme some of that!

Ready-to-wear: Malia Mills ready-to-wear sizes 2 – 16.

For example:

  • Malia Mills James cargo pants originally $495; now $247.50
  • Malia Mills Annie blouse originally $395; now $197.50
  • Malia Mills Montecito romper originally $595; now $297.50
  • Malia Mills Tribe dress originally $695; now $173.75 — hell yes!

All major credit cards and cash accepted.

DUE TO POPULAR DEMAND Malia Mills has added a 24 hour flash online sample sale to its sample sale extravaganza! Shop online at MaliaMills.com from Thursday, September 24th noon EST to Friday September 25th noon EST.

Bonus: live chat to help with your purchase!
